articles.title: Italian Parliamentary Delegation Here
articles.content:
Italian Parliamentary Delegation Here
Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of members of the parliament from various political parties of Italy headed by Osvaldo Napoli, vice-president of the Parliamentary Group of the People of  Liberty of the Chamber of Deputies who is chairman of the Committee for the Development of Relations and Cooperation with the DPRK of the Parliament, arrived here today by air.

articles.title: DPRK "Moran Hill" Stamps Awarded
articles.content:
DPRK "Moran Hill" Stamps Awarded
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- The 8th China Annual Best Foreign Stamp Poll took place in Beijing in December last year.
					 It brought together more than 20 countries including the DPRK and Cuba.
					
					 Entering into the competition were excellent stamps published in Juche 97 (2008).
					
					 The DPRK presented four kinds of stamps "Moran Hill".
					
					 A certificate of the best stamp award and cup were conferred upon DPRK "Moran Hill" Stamps which successfully depict the landscape of Moran Hill which took more beautiful looks in the era of Songun and cultural relics.

articles.title: Various Sports Contests to Be Held
articles.content:
Various Sports Contests to Be Held
Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Various international and national sports meets are scheduled to be held in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea this year.
					The International Association of Athletics Federations-the 23rd Mangyongdae Prize Marathon and the 19th International Figure Skating Festival for Paektusan Prize are to be held in April and February respectively to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. They are drawing public interest as they will contribute to the sports technique exchange and cooperation among nations in line with the ideas of the independence, peace and friendship.
					
					The 24th Pyongyang International Invitational Table Tennis Tournament will be held in August.
					
					Meanwhile, planned this year are such national tournaments as Paektusan Prize Sports Contest (February), Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest (March-April), National Championships (February-March, August-November), Pochonbo Torch Prize Sports Contest (May-June), National Sports Contest of Provincial Teams (June), 13th National Jongilbong Prize Taekwon-Do Championships (June), Jonsung Cup Sports Contest (July) and Osandok Prize Sports Contest (December).

articles.title: New Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- A sheetlet reflecting the contents of the joint New Year editorial published by leading newspapers of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has been brought out in the country.
					 Printed on the upper part of the sheetlet is "Bring about a radical turn in the people's standard of living by accelerating the development of light industry and agriculture once again this year that marks the 65th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea!", a slogan set forth in the editorial for the Korean people to hold high this year.
					
					 The sheetlet calls on the light industry and agricultural sectors, the major fronts of the efforts for improving the people's living standard, to increase consumer goods output and agricultural production. It also urges the four vanguard sectors of the economy to effect an upsurge in production so as to contribute to the betterment of the people's living.
					
					 Mirrored in some stamps of the sheetlet are tasks laid down in the editorial to give full play to the might of the Korean People's Army and push back the frontiers of science and technology and make a leap in all the sectors of the building of a great, prosperous and powerful country.
					
					 Also contained in the sheetlet are stamps showing the DPRK's stand of making efforts to realize national reunification at an early date with the entire nation united in accordance with the north-south joint declarations and develop relations of good-neighborliness and friendship with other countries and achieve global independence under the banner of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 Meanwhile, four kinds of individual stamps portraying panda, leopard and other animals were also issued.

articles.title: Coal Production on Increase
articles.content:
Coal Production on Increase
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- After receiving the joint New Year editorial published by leading newspapers of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, coal mines throughout the country have topped their daily quotas.
					 Increased production has been reported every day from major coal mines in western, northern and middle parts of the country.
					
					 The Thaehyang, Sinri, Chilli and other coal mines under the Anju Area Coal Mining Complex, have registered a record production, steadily raising the productivity through technical updating.
					
					 The February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine belonging to the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex turned out coal on the first day of the year much more than that of last year to be sent to power stations.
					
					 Coal mining complexes in Tokchon, Tukjang, Pukchang, Kujang and Onsong areas have overfulfilled their daily production plan.
					
					 Coal mines in Kaechon, Kangdong, Myongchon, Kyongwon and Chonnae areas and minor coal producers throughout the country are also doing their bit.
					
					 Meanwhile, brisk preparations are going on to inaugurate new pits and districts in different mines.

articles.title: Replacement of AA with Peace Treaty Called for
articles.content:
Replacement of AA with Peace Treaty Called for 
						
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- It is quite natural and right from a logical point of view that the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK proposed to the parties to the Armistice Agreement an early start of the talks for replacing the AA with a peace treaty.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 This is a very reasonable and flexible proposal as it takes the demands of the U.S. and other parties concerned into full consideration and reflects them in a bid to convince them. 
					
					 The equilibrium of strength and the balance of forces on the Korean Peninsula and in its vicinity go to prove that the key to solving the problem lies in putting an end to the hostile relations and the state of war between the DPRK and the U.S. 
					
					 Talks can be smoothly opened and the issue of denuclearization can find a successful solution only when positive efforts are made to create a peaceful environment by wiping out bilateral distrust and pooling will. 
					
					 A priority task is to conclude a peace treaty.
					
					 The conclusion of a peace treaty would provide a master key to solving all the pending problems. 
					
					 The issue of concluding a peace treaty can be settled by changing the order of action as required by the practice just as mentioned in the September 19 Joint Statement.
					
					 It is beyond any doubt that the conclusion of the peace treaty would help terminate the hostile relations between the DPRK and the U.S. and facilitate the process for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula at a rapid tempo. 
					
					 Ill-natured diatribes are now being made by some quarters to play down the validity and significance of the DPRK's proposal. This is nothing but a dishonest behavior to throw a wet blanket over the efforts to achieve peace, stability and denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 It will be quite possible to achieve peace, stability and denuclearization of the peninsula if the parties to the AA no longer prioritize their interests but make a bold decision to deal with the fundamental issue such as war and peace without delay and put it into practice, concludes the article.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Saber-Rattling Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Saber-Rattling Flailed
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- The 26th division of the south Korean army had staged five day-long provocative field mobile exercises in the area of Kyonggi Province since Jan. 11. In another development, the south Korean military decided to set up a "cyber command" under the "National Defense Intelligence Headquarters." The minister of "National Defense" raised a hue and cry over "the north's possible provocation," an oft-repeated trumpeting, and called for "taking thorough measures to cope" with it at the "New Year press conference."
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 Dangerous saber-rattling kicked off by the south Korean military is nothing but a grave provocation intended to escalate confrontation and tensions between the north and the south.
					
					 The south Korean military openly declared its scenario to vitiate the atmosphere of improving the inter-Korean relations with gun fire and continue rushing headlong into confrontation and a war of aggression against the north.
					
					 Obviously, the military bellicose forces of south Korea look like tiger moths embroiled in a war, ready to go through thick and thin to bar the inter-Korean relations from improving.
					
					 As the DPRK sets store by the inter-Korean relations, it will never pardon the south Korean warmongers for pursuing the moves for confrontation and war while making desperate efforts to push them to a collapse.
					
					 The ceaseless madcap military provocations on the part of the warmongers of south Korea would only betray their dirty true colors as wicked disturbers of the process for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Only history's stern punishment awaits the traitors going mad with confrontation and war, swimming against the trend of the times in the June 15 era of reunification.

articles.title: US Forces' Crimes under Fire
articles.content:
US Forces' Crimes under Fire 
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Civic and public organizations of various circles in south Korea inaugurated a "committee for erecting monument to Mi Son and Hyo Sun" and released an appeal on Jan. 15.
					 The appeal noted that unforgettable is a day in June eight years ago when middle schoolgirls Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son were cold-bloodedly killed by an armored car of the U.S. forces. The U.S. not only declared the criminals "not guilty" but also has behaved arrogantly, feigning ignorance of the crime still today, it added.
					
					 The appeal stressed that the above-said organizations have formed the committee with a view to erecting the monument reflecting the feelings of all the people remembering the two schoolgirls who were killed with their grudge unsettled.
					
					 While erecting the monument, the committee will struggle to the last to have the truth behind the murder probed and the criminals of the U.S. forces punished, the appeal noted, calling upon all the organizations and people desirous of independence and peace to launch joint actions.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of Reunification Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of Reunification Supported 
Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- A political party of Germany and an organization of Nigeria issued statements in support of the joint New Year editorial of the leading newspapers of the DPRK. 
					The Brandenburg State Committee of the Communist Party of Germany in its statement on Jan. 12 said that the editorial clarified the will of the Korean people to promote reconciliation and visits and contacts between people from all walks of life, giving primary consideration to the interests common to the Korean nation, for the purpose of positively realizing reconciliation and cooperation among Koreans.
					
					The statement extended full support and encouragement to the Korean people in their efforts to brilliantly adorn 2010 as a year of ushering in a new phase of independent reunification under the banner of independent reunification and the flag of peace against war.
					
					The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea in its statement on Jan. 2 hailed the inter-Korean summit and the publication of the June 15 joint declaration in 2000 as historic events of weighty importance in carrying out national reunification.
					
					The statement wished the Korean people new success in their efforts to achieve the independent reunification of the country and the reconciliation, cooperation and unity of the Korean nation this year, the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration and the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.

articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial Favored in Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Joint New Year Editorial Favored in Equatorial Guinea
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- Filiberto Ntutumu Nguema, general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, released a statement on January 8 in support of the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK.
					 He in his statement expressed hope that the DPRK would pave the way for improving the inter-Korean relations and positively achieve national reconciliation and cooperation as clarified in its joint New Year editorial. He extended full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for achieving the reunification of the country and peace, progress and justice.
					
					 Hailing the north-south summit and the publication of the June 15 joint declaration in Korea in 2000 as historic events of great significance in carrying out Korea's reunification, he wished the Korean people great success in their efforts to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of their country this year.

articles.title: DPRK Holidays to Be Commemorated in Mexico
articles.content:
DPRK Holidays to Be Commemorated in Mexico
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- A Mexican preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 was inaugurated with due ceremony on January 12.
					 The inaugural ceremony elected Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee discussed the issue of working out a plan for colorful political and cultural events to significantly commemorate the Day of the Sun and the February holiday and thoroughly implementing it.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, January 19 (KCNA) -- One day in February Juche 98 (2009) General Secretary Kim Jong Il had a meeting with senior officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 He talked about the efforts of the people to open the gate to a thriving nation by 2012 that marks the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Saying that to build a thriving socialist nation was what the President had intended and what the WPK has resolved, he underscored issues arising in making the country prosperous and powerful and improving the people's living standard as early as possible.
					
					 He then expressed his firm determination to carry through the behest of the President without fail to improve the people's living in a short span of time.
					
					 The officials were much moved by his deep concern for the people's living.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il ve funcion de grupo artistico de unidad 324 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il ve funcion de grupo artistico de unidad 324 del EPC
Pyongyang, 19 de enero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion del grupo de propaganda artistica de la gran Unidad Combinada 324 del EPC.
					Los ejecutantes presentaron en la escena la poesia en dialogo "Grandioso y revolucionario plan diario", el solo femenino "Enalteceremos mejor al General padre", el quinteto femenino "Mi pais donde se realizan los ideales del pueblo", la charla comica "Pensemos en el tiempo de soldado", las canciones en serie "De un tiron" y "Que conquiste la tecnica de punta", la poesia y narracion "La luz del socialismo y la vista de centinela", el tambor y cancion "Cancion de la movilizacion general", el coro "Seremos el septimo regimiento de hoy" y otras piezas de diferentes generos.
					
					A traves de este espectaculo signado del espiritu revolucionario de los militares, los ejecutantes demostraron bien el invencible poderio del heroico EPC crecido como ejercito potente sin rivales bajo la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la firme conviccion y voluntad de sus uniformados de defender a costa de la vida a la Direccion de la Revolucion y llevar a feliz termino con las armas la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo al partido.
					
					Al manifestar sin reservas su entusiasmo e impetu con que llamaban en el pasado a los militares a la lucha y las proezas mediante su combativa propaganda y agitacion, que se hacen en el frente, al pie de los puestos y campos de ejercicio, ellos comprobaron firmemente la justeza y la vitalidad de la orientacion de nuestro partido sobre la propaganda artistica al estilo de la guerrilla antijaponesa y mostraron contundentemente el poderio de los artistas militares que cumplen plenamente su mision combativa de soldado honrado en la primera linea del frente ideologico.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que los miembros del grupo de propaganda artistica hayan ofrecido esta magnifica funcion de alto nivel ideo-artistico con las obras de gran valor cognoscitivo y educativo que reflejan vividamente la inagotable potencia espiritual y nobles rasgos del EPC, el Dirigente les expreso agradecimiento evaluando altamente sus exitos logrados en la ocasion.
					
					Reconocio los esfuerzos de ellos senalando que los miembros del grupo de propaganda artistica realizan su trabajo de manera combativa compartiendo las malas y las buenas con los soldados como artistas del ejercito revolucionario, de modo que los militares levantados en la marcha general del ano nuevo tengan la fe y optimismo de la victoria, la combatividad y coraje con que exterminaran a los enemigos.
					
					La propaganda artistica es uno de los medios poderosos para educar a los militares, subrayo y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para todos los grupos de propaganda artistica en dinamizar sus actividades conforme a la demanda de la epoca del Songun.
					
					Disfrutaron la funcion con el Dirigente los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, y otros miembros de mando del ejercito y la jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui.

articles.title: Se preven muchos juegos deportivos internacionales y nacionales
articles.content:
Se preven muchos juegos deportivos internacionales y nacionales 
Pyongyang, 19 de enero (ATCC) -- En Corea tendran lugar este ano numerosos encuentros  deportivos internacionales y nacionales en medio del gran interes y atencion de los especialistas y aficionados al deporte.
					  La Asociacion Internacional de Federaciones Atleticas - el 23o Torneo Internacional de Maraton por el Premio Mangyongdae que se realizara con motivo del significativo Dia del Sol ( 15 de abril, cumpleanos del Presidente Kim Il Sung) y el XIX Festival Internacional de Patinaje Artistico por el Premio Paektusan dedicado a la jubilosa fiesta de febrero (16 de febrero, cumpleanos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il), llaman la atencion de numerosas personas por la gran contribucion a fortalecer el intercambio y cooperacion tecnicos en la rama deportiva entre los paises bajo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad.
					
					  Se entablara en agosto el 24o Torneo Internacional de Tenis de Mesa por Invitacion de Pyongyang.
					
					  Por otra parte, se efectuaran los partidos deportivos nacionales, entre otros, la Competencia Deportiva por el Premio Paektusan (febrero), la Competencia Deportiva por el Premio Mangyongdae (marzo-abril), el Campeonato Nacional (febrero-marzo, agosto-noviembre), la Competencia Deportiva por el Premio Antorcha de Pochonbo (mayo-junio), la Competencia Deportiva Nacional entre las Provincias (junio), el XIII Campeonato Nacional de Taekwondo por el Premio Jongilbong (junio), la Competencia Deportiva por la Copa Jonsung (julio) y el Torneo Deportivo por el Premio Osandok (diciembre).

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun aboga por la declaracion del MINREX
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun aboga por la declaracion del MINREX 
Pyongyang, 19 de enero (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea propuso a los paises interesados del Acuerdo de Armisticio iniciar inmediatamente el dialogo para sustituir este documento por el convenio de paz. 
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un articulo individual difundido en su edicion de este martes, lo califica de una propuesta muy justa y conveniente.
					
					Esta propuesta de la RPDC es una iniciativa muy racional y flexible que toma en consideracion y refleja suficientemente la demanda de los paises interesados incluso a Estados Unidos para que ellos se convencieran.
					
					El equilibrio de las fuerzas y la correlacion de estas, formados en la actualidad en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno, prueban que la clave de la solucion del problema reside en poner fin a las relaciones hostiles y el estado de beligerancia entre la RPDC y EE.UU. 
					
					Solo cuando ambas partes se eliminen la desconfianza y se esfuerzan activamente con la misma alma por crear un ambiente pacifico, se reanudaran facilmente las conversaciones y se solucionara exitosamente el problema de desnuclearizacion. 
					
					Lo mas apremiante es concertar el convenio de paz, porque esto es la clave para la solucion de todos los problemas pendientes. 
					
					El problema sobre la concertacion del convenio de paz esta mencionado en la Declaracion Conjunta del 19 de Septiembre. Por lo tanto, se podria cambiar el turno de acciones conforme a la demanda practica.
					
					La firma del convenio de paz, indudablemente, eliminara las relaciones hostiles RPDC-EE.UU. e impulsara activamente a buen ritmo la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Ahora, algunos difunden mal rumor con el fin de debilitar la justeza y la importancia de la propuesta de la RPDC, lo cual echa agua fria al logro de la paz, la estabilidad y la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Si los paises interesados del Acuerdo de Armisticio toman la valiente decision de tratar el problema causal, o sea, la guerra o la paz, y la ponen en practica, sin demorar mas el tiempo anteponiendo sus propios intereses, se solucionaran los problemas sobre la paz, la estabilidad y la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena maniobras de los belicistas surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena maniobras  de los belicistas surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 19 de enero (ATCC) -- La division No. 26 de las fuerzas terrestres del Sur de Corea desarrollo durante 5 dias desde el 11 de enero la provocativa maniobra de movilidad al aire libre en la zona de la provincia de Kyonggi.
					  Por otra parte, la capa militar surcoreana decidio organizar la "comandancia sibernica" perteneciente a la "sede de inteligencia de defensa nacional".
					
					  Tambien, en una "rueda de prensa por el ano nuevo" el ministro de "Defensa Nacional" del Sur de Corea hablo de la necesidad de hacer "disposicion estricta" frente a la supuesta "posibilidad de la provocacion por parte del Norte".
					
					  Los peligrosos alborotos del sector militar surcoreano devienen un grave acto provocativo para agravar mas el enfrentamiento y la tension entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					  Senala asi el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 19 y continua:
					
					  El sector militar surcoreano declaro abiertamente que seguira entregandose a las maniobras por la confrontacion y la guerra de agresion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea destruyendo con tiroteo y canonazo el ambiente de la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					   Esta claro que las fuerzas belicistas del sector militar surcoreano son  las polillas belicosas que  no temen ni fuego ni agua a fin de detener la mejora de las relaciones con el Norte.
					
					  La RPDC que aprecia las relaciones con el Sur no tolerara jamas las maniobras de enfrentamiento y guerra de los belicistas surcoreanos que actuan desesperadamente para llevar al fracaso las relaciones N-S.
					
					  Cuanto mas los belicistas surcoreanos maniobran locamente para las provocaciones militares tanto mas revelaran su sucia naturaleza de perverso impedidor de la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur y de maniaco de  guerra.
					
					  Tales traidores,  que obstaculizan la corriente de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio, no podran evitar la severa sentencia de la historia.
